response.job_title: Chemical Engineer | Engineering & Supply Chain Technologies | Simulation User and Modeler
response.summary:
As Chemical Engineer I am looking for new challenging opportunities in the industry, mainly related to: Refining Operations, Supply Chain Optimization, Process Design & Process Optimization. 

My competencies include work in the private sector, research, academia and Colombian government, and range from small-scale researches to country-wide energy projects, achieving Customer Value Creation, Accurate Consulting and Sales Support.

Currently, I am working on supply chain management, building, using and updating operating models for logistics and process optimization. Some tools include: Aspen Petroleum Scheduler (APS), Aspen Multi-Blend Optimizer (MBO), Aspen Operation Reconciliation and Accounting (AORA) and  Aspen Hysys (Refsys).

Interests: Operations planning and scheduling, Process Control, Simulation and Optimization.
response.skills: Petróleo y gas natural, Gestión de proyectos, Process Simulation, Process Optimization, Chemical Engineering, Process Engineering, Aspen HYSYS, Engineering, Supply Chain Engineering, Project Engineering, Refinery, Petroleum Refining, Microsoft SQL Server, Aspen Petroleum Scheduler, Biofuels, Petrochemical, P&ID, HAZOP, Commissioning, Process Control

profile_positions.description:
 Experienced simulation user for refinery process optimization, petroleum supply chain planning and material balance & reconciliation models. 
 Support Engineer of Aspen Technology products: Hysys, Petroleum Scheduler, Multi-blend optimizer and Balance, reconciliation and accounting
 Business Consultant in technology adoption for industrial customers. 
 Analyst of terms and conditions of warranty and technical support.
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer
